26  class KSComponentMaximumData
27  {
28  public:
29  std::string fName;
30  std::string fGroupName;
31  std::string fParentName;
32  };
33 
34  KSComponent* BuildOutputMaximum( KSComponent* aComponent )
35  {
36  if( aComponent->Is< bool >() == true )
37  {
38  return new KSComponentMaximum< bool >( aComponent, aComponent->As< bool >() );
39  }
40 
41  if( aComponent->Is< unsigned char >() == true )
42  {
43  return new KSComponentMaximum< unsigned char >( aComponent, aComponent->As< unsigned char >() );
44  }
45 
46  if( aComponent->Is< char >() == true )
47  {
48  return new KSComponentMaximum< char >( aComponent, aComponent->As< char >() );
49  }
50 
51  if( aComponent->Is< unsigned short >() == true )
52  {
53  return new KSComponentMaximum< unsigned short >( aComponent, aComponent->As< unsigned short >() );
54  }
55 
56  if( aComponent->Is< short >() == true )
57  {
58  return new KSComponentMaximum< short >( aComponent, aComponent->As< short >() );
59  }
60 
61  if( aComponent->Is< unsigned int >() == true )
62  {
63  return new KSComponentMaximum< unsigned int >( aComponent, aComponent->As< unsigned int >() );
64  }
65 
66  if( aComponent->Is< int >() == true )
67  {
68  return new KSComponentMaximum< int >( aComponent, aComponent->As< int >() );
69  }
70 
71  if( aComponent->Is< unsigned long >() == true )
72  {
73  return new KSComponentMaximum< unsigned long >( aComponent, aComponent->As< unsigned long >() );
74  }
75 
76  if( aComponent->Is< long >() == true )
77  {
78  return new KSComponentMaximum< long >( aComponent, aComponent->As< long >() );
79  }
80 
81  if( aComponent->Is< float >() == true )
82  {
83  return new KSComponentMaximum< float >( aComponent, aComponent->As< float >() );
84  }
85 
86  if( aComponent->Is< double >() == true )
87  {
88  return new KSComponentMaximum< double >( aComponent, aComponent->As< double >() );
89  }
90 
91  if( aComponent->Is< KTwoVector >() == true )
92  {
93  return new KSComponentMaximum< KTwoVector >( aComponent, aComponent->As< KTwoVector >() );
94  }
95 
96  if( aComponent->Is< KThreeVector >() == true )
97  {
98  return new KSComponentMaximum< KThreeVector >( aComponent, aComponent->As< KThreeVector >() );
99  }
100 
101  if( aComponent->Is< KTwoMatrix >() == true )
102  {
103  return new KSComponentMaximum< KTwoMatrix >( aComponent, aComponent->As< KTwoMatrix >() );
104  }
105 
106  if( aComponent->Is< KThreeMatrix >() == true )
107  {
108  return new KSComponentMaximum< KThreeMatrix >( aComponent, aComponent->As< KThreeMatrix >() );
109  }
110 
111  return NULL;
112  }
113 
114  typedef KComplexElement< KSComponentMaximumData > KSComponentMaximumBuilder;
115 
116  template< >
117  inline bool KSComponentMaximumBuilder::Begin()
118  {
119  fObject = new KSComponentMaximumData;
120  return true;
121  }
122 
123  template< >
124  inline bool KSComponentMaximumBuilder::AddAttribute( KContainer* aContainer )
125  {
126  if( aContainer->GetName() == "name" )
127  {
128  std::string tName = aContainer->AsReference< std::string >();
129  fObject->fName = tName;
130  return true;
131  }
132  if( aContainer->GetName() == "group" )
133  {
134  std::string tGroupName = aContainer->AsReference< std::string >();
135  fObject->fGroupName = tGroupName;
136  return true;
137  }
138  if( aContainer->GetName() == "component" )
139  {
140  objctmsg( eWarning ) <<"deprecated warning in KSComponentMaximumBuilder: Please use the attribute <parent> instead <component>"<<eom;
141  std::string tParentName = aContainer->AsReference< std::string >();
142  fObject->fParentName = tParentName;
143  return true;
144  }
145  if( aContainer->GetName() == "parent" )
146  {
147  std::string tParentName = aContainer->AsReference< std::string >();
148  fObject->fParentName = tParentName;
149  return true;
150  }
151  return false;
152  }
153 
154  template< >
155  inline bool KSComponentMaximumBuilder::End()
156  {
157  KSComponent* tParentComponent = NULL;
158  if( fObject->fGroupName.empty() == false )
159  {
160  KSComponentGroup* tComponentGroup = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponentGroup >( fObject->fGroupName );
161  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tComponentGroup->ComponentCount(); tIndex++ )
162  {
163  KSComponent* tGroupComponent = tComponentGroup->ComponentAt( tIndex );
164  if( tGroupComponent->GetName() == fObject->fParentName )
165  {
166  tParentComponent = tGroupComponent;
167  break;
168  }
169  }
170  if( tParentComponent == NULL )
171  {
172  objctmsg( eError ) << "component maximum builder could not find component <" << fObject->fParentName << "> in group <" << fObject->fGroupName << ">" << eom;
173  return false;
174  }
175  }
176  else
177  {
178  tParentComponent = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponent >( fObject->fParentName );
179  }
180  KSComponent* tComponent = BuildOutputMaximum( tParentComponent );
181  tComponent->SetName( fObject->fName );
182  delete fObject;
183  Set( tComponent );
184  return true;
185  }
186 
187 }
188 
189 #endif
